name: 2toTango
description: Well, it's looks like the UAC has had all it's prisions filled: so the only way to get rid of inmates is to throw then into a series of arenas with a few other 'mates, and let them try and outdo each other, and kill each other. Jeez, that's sounds like fun....throw me in a arena with a plasma rifle, and a couple of democrates, and i'll show ya a darn good time! ;)
